modName: Bron Ul Drem-Call of Valor Remade
summary: Just finished the main quest? Only to find out that your sick new shout summons three nordic heroes you just heard of! No more folks.
descriptionHtml:
Just finished the main quest? Only to find out that your sick new shout summons three nordic heroes you just heard of! No more folks.

Hakon has been replaced by Ysgramor.
Gormlaith by Olaf One-Eye.
Felldir by Jurgen Windcaller.
Now Dovakiin can cry for help with style!

Minor tweaks have been done to Ulfgar the Unending to make his outfit similar to the one from Bloodmoon and Olaf's to resemble a nordic king.

Requires: Update 1.9
author: Lord Burnch
